name: Validate the functionality to Attach files in Files tab and able to save the data successfully

testSteps.description: Given underwriter is on home page
And underwriter navigate to Files tab
When underwriter attached 'Rating invoice', 'Rating docs attached @123.', 'rating docs', 'invoice.pdf'
Then file 'Rating invoice' attached successfully and displayed in Files
